#summary One-may represent any piece of information thanks to "arrows".

= Introduction =
There are plenty of ways to use arrows to represent information. But the fundamental key to arrows usage is to define _contexts_ as sets of arrows pointed by context arrows. Contexts can embeds inner contexts, forming a context hierarchy.
